summary: Iteration 29 - Public Website Phase 1 Testing Complete. All 25 backend tests passed (100%). All public pages load correctly. Contact form submission works. Services API returns data. Existing CVP routes (login, intake) still functional. Header navigation dropdowns work. Footer links present.
critical_code_review_comments: All public pages use PublicLayout with consistent header/footer
SEOHead component properly implements react-helmet-async for meta tags
Contact form has proper validation and rate limiting (5/min)
Services API returns 7 services with proper structure
Pricing page correctly shows Solo £19, Portfolio £39, Professional £79
Calendly embed on /booking is a placeholder (MOCKED - expected)
All data-testid attributes present for key interactive elements
test_credentials: No auth required for public pages
seed_data_creation: Contact form test submissions created with TEST_ prefix
context_for_next_testing_agent: Public website Phase 1 fully tested. All pages load: /, /compliance-vault-pro, /services, /services/ai-workflow-automation, /pricing, /booking, /about, /contact, /legal/privacy, /legal/terms. APIs tested: GET /api/public/services, POST /api/public/contact, POST /api/public/service-inquiry. Existing CVP routes verified: /login, /intake/start. Calendly embed is a placeholder (expected).

homepage_loads.details: Hero section, Get Started button, Book Demo button, service links all present

cvp_landing_page.details: CVP branding, compliance requirements, features section all present

services_hub.details: 4 service cards displayed, all 5 services listed

service_detail_page.details: Service name, features, pricing info, CTA buttons present

pricing_page.details: 3 plans: Solo £19, Portfolio £39, Professional £79. Monthly/Yearly toggle works

booking_page.details: Calendly placeholder present with fallback link. MOCKED - Calendly widget is placeholder

about_page.details: Company info, Our Story, Our Values, UK-based info present

contact_page.details: Form with all fields, submission works, success message shown

privacy_page.details: Privacy policy content, GDPR section present

terms_page.details: Terms of service content, governing law section present

login_page.details: Existing CVP login page still works

intake_wizard.details: Existing CVP intake wizard still works

header_navigation.details: Platform dropdown, Services dropdown, direct links all work

footer_links.details: Footer present with Platform, Services, Company, Legal sections

services_api.details: Returns 7 services with code, name, description, category, pricing

contact_api.details: Accepts form data, returns submission_id, rate limited to 5/min

mocked_apis_list: Calendly widget on /booking page - placeholder with fallback link

design_review.color_scheme: Teal + white + charcoal grey - consistent across all pages
design_review.contrast: Good text contrast on all backgrounds
design_review.responsive: Desktop layout tested, mobile menu toggle present
